attributes.action: Set the price of puppy sales to no more than a rescue
attributes.additional_details: To help to stop dog theft, reducing the value of a dog could help to stamp out dog theft
attributes.background: Bring in a set price for dogs, to help stop dog theft, set the price so that no one can charge any more than a rescue unless they are Crufts KC registered

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government aren't responsible for setting commercial prices.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make it illegal to sell dogs without a licence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571526

We also couldn't publish a petition calling for an action that related to registration with a specific non-Government body.
